title: Slack Message Notifier

openaiSpec.name: send_message_to_slack_channel_via_http_action

channel.description: This parameter specifies the target Slack channel name.

message.description: This parameter specifies the message a user wants to send to the Slack channel.

openaiSpec.description: This function sends an authorized user's message to a specific Slack channel via an HTTP action.

overviewMarkdown:
# Slack Message Notifier
With this plugin, you can send messages from TypingMind to a Slack channel once you authenticate with your Slack account.

### ðŸ”’ **Authentication Required**
To use this plugin, you need to authenticate with your Slack account via OAuth 2.0.
- [ðŸ‘‰ How to configure OAuth for TypingMind plugin](https://docs.typingmind.com/plugins/oauth-for-plugin)
- [ðŸ‘‰ How to install Slack App with OAuth](https://api.slack.com/authentication/oauth-v2)

### ðŸ’¡ **Example Usage**:

> "Send a summary of this document to the `notes` channel."
>
> *<< Your document content >>*
